text:
Hi all. I'm trying to use the aws-sdk in a serverless function. Added it to the package.json and executed `hs functions deploy poc.functions`  but the cli gives the error `hubId **** does not have access to serverless builds.`

Could not find any reference to the "serverless builds" and I'm supossed to have CMS Enterprise tier. How can I activate the serverless builds? Thanks in advance for the help.
